name: test_e2e_with_logs[038_SQLI_BOOL_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_007` |
| **Name** | SUBSTRING-based boolean injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND SUBSTRING(username,1,1)='a`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20SUBSTRING(username%2C1%2C1)%3D'a`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~75000ms
- **Timestamp**: 15:06:17.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_007-1770995177371-gqq2bz6 pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_007 uri=/?q='%20AND%20SUBSTRING(username%2C1%2C1)%3D'a client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
